instructions: From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the MORE icon. Tap Settings . Tap More settings . Tap Text Messages . Tap Manage SIM card messages . Tap the MORE icon. Tap Delete . Tap each message to be deleted or Select all . Tap Delete . Tap OK .

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'System,' then tap Storage . Under 'Device Memory,' view the following: Total space Available space System memory Used space Cached data Miscellaneous files
